name: QdbtTabular Widget for Qt-GUI toolkit
short_description:
The QdbtTabular class represents a table widget for Troll Tech's Qt-GUI toolkit
which looks similar to the `detailed list' of Windows 95.
It provides customizable editing and selection modes.
